Articles.Content:
I want to make a really heavy empty fuel tank.

How do you change this in the config file?

mass = (very big number)

RESOURCE

{

name = LiquidFuel

amount = 0

maxAmount = (whatever you want)

}

RESOURCE

{

name = Oxidizer

amount = 0

maxAmount = (whatever you want)

}

To put it more explicitly dry mass is the mass line in the config file. Resource mass is added by the game automatically based on the numbers of units of the resource and it's density (the latter defined in config files in the resources folder).
